messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2598
messages.msgSnippet: ... Only 4000 miles or so for me.... ... Should be easy for you to drive to the channel, take a car ferry and amble along the south coast. If you realy come
messages.messageBody:
On 6 Nov 02, at 11:24, Alan & Brenda Leonard wrote:

> 11/2/02 15:46:
>
> > Lets go!!!
> > You can fly to Dulles( Minn-London flights go via Dulles). I'll join
> > you onna plane and off we go. See London. Camp with 1500 mainly
> > unschoolers and then drink wine in France. Sound good?
>
> Yep! I definitey want to go. I'd about given up hope on getting to
> an unschooling conference while over here. I forget England is so
> close!

Only 4000 miles or so for me....
>
> Eveytime you write something, Shyrley, I get more excited! Hurry up,
> May. I know my husband won't be coming, either. Heck, by May, who
> knows where he'll even be.
>
Should be easy for you to drive to the channel, take a car ferry and
amble along the south coast.
If you realy come closer to the date I will post a description of the
campground so we can pitch tents near each other - there's no
designed lots, you just pitch where there's a space.
Y'all have to fly little US flags :-)

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2598
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yep!  I definitey want to go.  I d about given up hope on getting to an unschooling conference while over here.  I forget England is so close! Eveytime you
messages.messageBody:
11/2/02 15:46:

> Lets go!!!
> You can fly to Dulles( Minn-London flights go via Dulles). I'll join
> you onna plane and off we go. See London. Camp with 1500 mainly
> unschoolers and then drink wine in France.
> Sound good?

Yep! I definitey want to go. I'd about given up hope on getting to an
unschooling conference while over here. I forget England is so close!

Eveytime you write something, Shyrley, I get more excited! Hurry up, May.
I know my husband won't be coming, either. Heck, by May, who knows where
he'll even be.

> I don't know Brenda, 6 or 7 people? <g>
> Kelli

The guestroom at Chez Leonard has been booked for 7 people in May. Please
confirm your reservation closer to the actual date! <g>

brenda
